data.description: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Flared/Light Mag + Overflow/Threat Detector/FTTC/Grave Robber + Adrenaline Junkie/Frenzy/Demo/OfA/Rampage

PvE: Any + Tac/Appended Mag + Surplus/Rapid Hit/Outlaw + Wellspring/MKC/Dbreak/Rampage/Demo/Dfly/Explosive Payload

PvP: Hammer/Fluted/Polygonal/Arrowhead/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Rapid Hit/Quickdraw/Slideshot/Rangefinder/Outlaw + MKC/Rampage/EP/Opening Shot (EotS and HIR are possible choices, which have less usage than the other final column perks listed here, but are still something)
Steady Rounds may be a good mag perk if combined with a range sight/masterwork. +14 range at a cost of -5 range can be a good trade.

PvE: Hard/Quick+ spikes + Field Prep/Clown/Threat Detector + Chain Reaction/Demo
Not as strong of rolls as Interference, but still can get 7 spike grenades with backup mag.
Spike grenades benefit from reduced blast radius as that shifts more damage to impact damage. Velocity barrels are acceptable, but avoid Confined Launch and Volatile Launch if using spike grenades.

PvP: Confined/Volatile/(Linear/Quick) + prox + TD + Rampage
Inverse of Spikes, we want increased blast radius when using Proximity Grenades - but not at the cost of other stats.
